dao

Class BidDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.BidDAO

  • public class BidDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    A java DAO that access and modifies the Bid table in database.

      • roundBidStatusUpdate

        public static void roundBidStatusUpdate(java.lang.String courseCode,
                                        java.lang.String sectionCode,
                                        double minBid)
        Method to update the status of bids depending on minBid amount, if its bigger or equal to minBid then it is successful
        Parameters:
        courseCode - course code of the course that has its bids' status being updated
        sectionCode - section code of the course that has its bids being updated
        minBid - minimum bid of section of course that has its bids being updated
